project.name: Netty
project.description: Netty is an asynchronous event-driven network application framework for rapid development of maintainable high performance protocol servers and clients.

group.title: Central interface for all I/O operations

item.justification: Padding was removed from CONTINUATION frame in http2-spec.
The com.barchart.udt library exposes this class in their API, but slf4j is an optional dependency to Netty.
The com.barchart.udt library exposes this class in their API, but slf4j is an optional dependency to Netty.
They're not "external classes" if they're from a Netty package.
This should be test-only, and we're removing support for JUnit 4.
Acceptable incompatibility for required change, because the method was not previously exposed; protected visiblity in super-class, not made public in final sub-class until now

Acceptable incompatibility for required change, because the method was not previously exposed; protected visiblity in super-class, not made public in final sub-class until now
Protected methods of a final class.
Old return type made no sense, the parent channel is a NioServerDomainSocketChannel which does not implement ServerSocketChannel. The method always threw a ClassCastException (except for null).
